text: i don't see why i'm the one being persecuted here. dr. hofstadter, he was bragging about his sexual desirability to anyone who would listen. you know, and howard wolowitz, he spent two years using university resources building a six-breasted sex robot. oh, and at the office christmas party, i heard rajesh koothrappali refer to you several times as brown sugar.
